text: VARIANCE AND STANDARD DEVIATION 2 The variance or standard deviation of the data values give a measure of the spread of the data. 345 The previous slide showed that 𝑉𝑎𝑟 𝑋 = 𝐸 𝑋 − 𝜇 2 = 𝐸 𝑋2 − 𝜇2 This is the form the Nelson text book uses. Either form can be used. 67 How to use a calculator to determine the mean and variance of a discrete probability functions. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpGxDQZuSa4 8910 a) Find k b) Over a long period, what is the mean number of deaths per dozen crayfish? c) Find the standard deviation for the distribution. 1112 a) The 𝜇 b) The 𝜎 EXERCISE 2.07 (PAGE 81) • Question 2, 3, 6, 10, 12, 14, 17
